description:
The project is titled 'SHAMIYANA APP'. 

This project aims to create an online food delivery and ordering app for Shamiyana Cafe, which will make the ordering process easy and efficient. It will also provide an administrative web portal to manage the cafe. Skills used includes Flutter, Dart, Firebase. The project uses Flutter, Dart, Firebase. The project is titled 'RAPID'. 

RAPID is a web app that enables users to play real-time games such as chess with their friends while having a one-on-one video call. The app utilizes WebSockets for real-time communication of gameplay information and WebRTC for the video call feature. Skills used includes NodeJS, ExpressJS, Socket.IO, WebRTC, HTML, CSS, JS, Docker. The project uses NodeJS, ExpressJS, Socket.IO, WebRTC, HTML, CSS, JS, Docker. The project is titled 'SMART SENSING MIDDLEWARE'. 

This project involves creating a web application to collect sensor data from smart home devices and display the data in the form of graphs. The application will help users understand and analyse the data more effectively. Skills used includes ReactJS, HTML, CSS. The project uses ReactJS, HTML, CSS.
